<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_hete_clv_maximiz_campaigns"> <x_hete_clv_maximiz_campaigns action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaign_name>upsell</campaign_name> <campaign_type>retention</campaign_type> <channel>email</channel> <created_by>Emma Thompson</created_by> <customer_tier>silver</customer_tier> <enable_ab_testing>false</enable_ab_testing> <estimated_reach>4799</estimated_reach> <launch_date>2025-12-03</launch_date> <launch_time>09:00</launch_time> <launched_at>2025-12-02 00:00:00</launched_at> <message_body>Dear {CustomerName},
As a valued Silver tier customer, we are writing to inform you of important updates to your policy. Based on your profile, we recommend considering these coverage options: Jewelry & Valuables.
Please review the attached information and contact us if you have any questions.
Best regards, Customer Service Team</message_body> <priority>medium</priority> <product_propensity>Jewelry & Valuables</product_propensity> <send_test_email>false</send_test_email> <status>launched</status> <subject_line>Important Silver Policy Update - Action Required</subject_line> <sys_created_by>vedavallic@hexaware.com</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2025-12-02 03:19:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>08dc82f5ebe1f2904870fc4dbad0cd2b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>vedavallic@hexaware.com</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2025-12-02 03:19:55</sys_updated_on> <tone_style>professional</tone_style> </x_hete_clv_maximiz_campaigns> </record_update>
